title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 356.2 - Elections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 356.2 - Elections

State Regulations

This Part applies to distributions made on or after January
1, 1993. Notwithstanding any provision applicable to members and beneficiaries
of the New York State and Local Retirement Systems to the contrary that would
otherwise limit a distributee's election under this Part, a distributee may
elect at the time and in the manner prescribed by the comptroller, to have any
portion of an eligible rollover distribution paid directly to an eligible
retirement plan specified by the distributee in a direct rollover, subject to
the limitations provided in sections
356.4, 356.5
and
356.6
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
356.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
